remarks: Composition of two limits.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2016.)
statement:
limcco.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ R =/= C ) ) -> R e. B ) $.
limcco.s $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B ) -> S e. CC ) $.
limcco.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( x e. A |-> R ) limCC X ) ) $.
limcco.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( ( y e. B |-> S ) limCC C ) ) $.
limcco.1 $e |- ( y = R -> S = T ) $.
limcco.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ R = C ) ) -> T = D ) $.
limcco $p |- ( ph -> D e. ( ( x e. A |-> T ) limCC X ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
$d T y $.
$d ph x y $.
